channel.title: Caryn's Castle
channel.copyright: copyright © 2006 Caryn's Castle and IBAX Management Services Corporation
channel.itunes:subtitle: A Narrated Audio Book about Courage, Magic and Adventure
channel.itunes:author: R H Politz
channel.itunes:summary: Audio Book Caryn's New World, The Valley of New Beginnings. A narrated adventure story about a single mother, her courage and persistence, a war, a new land where reality and fantasy are the norm and a host of dangerous encounters, clues, riddles and mysteries.
channel.description: Audio Book Caryn's New World, The Valley of New Beginnings. A narrated adventure story about a single mother, her courage and persistence, a war, a new land where reality and fantasy are the norm and a host of dangerous encounters, clues, riddles and mysteries.

item.title: Caryn's: The Valley, Prologue
item.itunes:author: R H Politz
item.itunes:subtitle: Audio Book A short introduction to the narrated story
item.itunes:summary: The Prologue is only a short introduction so visit our site and listen to Chapter One
item.itunes:keywords: podcast, podcasts, audiobook, audio book, audiobooks, audio books, narrated stories, narrated story, talking book, talking books, books for the blind, caryn's new world, caryn's castle, carynscastle

item.title: Caryn's: The Valley, Chapter 1, The Strife
item.itunes:author: R H Politz
item.itunes:subtitle: Audio Book Chapter One of The Valley of New Beginnings
item.itunes:summary: They had just settled in to their new home when chaos erupted and turned their whole world upside down.
item.itunes:keywords: podcast, podcasts, audiobook, audio book, audiobooks, audio books, narrated stories, narrated story, talking book, talking books, books for the blind, caryn's new world, caryn's castle, carynscastle

item.title: A Christmas Carol by Charles Dickens
item.itunes:author: Charles Dickens, Read by R H Politz
item.itunes:subtitle: Audio Book, Charles Dickens A Christmas Carol, Read by R H Politz
item.itunes:summary: This classic Christmas story is an annual tradition and now you can listen to a narrated version as an MP3 audio CD
item.itunes:keywords: christmas carol, a christmas carol, audiobook, audio book, audiobooks, audio books, narrated stories, narrated story, talking book, talking books, books for the blind, caryn's castle, carynscastle

item.title: Caryn's: The Valley, Chapter 2
item.itunes:author: R H Politz
item.itunes:subtitle: Audio Book Chapter Two of The Valley of New Beginnings
item.itunes:summary: It had been a hard and long trip but there they were, in a place to sleep and reorganize. But what kind of a place was it and what other surprises did it have in store for them?
item.itunes:keywords: podcast, podcasts, audiobook, audio book, audiobooks, audio books, narrated stories, narrated story, talking book, talking books, books for the blind, caryn's new world, caryn's castle, carynscastle

item.title: Caryn's: The Valley, Chapter 3
item.itunes:author: R H Politz
item.itunes:subtitle: Audio Book Chapter Three of The Valley of New Beginnings
item.itunes:summary: A Giant Locked Door, Hens and Eggs from nowhere, Silver Buckets under a bush, what other surprises await the three vagabonds as they explore this strange new place?
item.itunes:keywords: podcast, podcasts, audiobook, audio book, audiobooks, audio books, narrated stories, narrated story, talking book, talking books, books for the blind, caryn's new world, caryn's castle, carynscastle

item.title: Caryn's: The Valley, Chapter 4
item.itunes:author: R H Politz
item.itunes:subtitle: Audio Book Chapter Four of The Valley of New Beginnings
item.itunes:summary: A magic puzzle that turns out to be a test, Books that change titles and a little rotund man appearing from a locked closet; Very strange but such is the norm for this new refuge they have found, or, did this place actually find them instead?
item.itunes:keywords: podcast, podcasts, audiobook, audio book, audiobooks, audio books, narrated stories, narrated story, talking book, talking books, books for the blind, caryn's new world, caryn's castle, carynscastle

item.title: Caryn's: The Valley, Chapter 5
item.itunes:author: R H Politz
item.itunes:subtitle: Audio Book Chapter Five of The Valley of New Beginnings
item.itunes:summary: After an extremely long wait Teacher finally gets a name AND a Title. Now, Lord Bixby will have to teach the Royal Family all the rules of etiquette and help them understand this strange new place.
item.itunes:keywords: podcast, podcasts, audiobook, audio book, audiobooks, audio books, narrated stories, narrated story, talking book, talking books, books for the blind, caryn's new world, caryn's castle, carynscastle
